title: REPLACE
description: Returns a new string in which all occurrences of the target substring within the original string are replaced by the specified replacement substring. The replacement is case-sensitive.

parameters.name: replacement
parameters.description: The substring to insert in place of the target substring.

examples:
REPLACE("Coupon coupon Coupon", "Coupon", "Discount")
-- Returns: "Discount coupon Discount"
-- Only the exact matches of "Coupon" (case-sensitive) are replaced with "Discount".

REPLACE(CaseDescription, "urgent", "important")
-- Replaces all occurrences of "urgent" with "important" in the field 'CaseDescription'
